references: Related: Ord 87150, Ord 88051, Ord 89666, Ord 87619, Ord 89000
summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal water supply system; authorizing additional blanketing for the Tolt River South Fork storage reservoir dam and related expenditures contemplated by plan and system Ordinance 87150; making appropriations therefor from Municipal Water Revenue Bond 1958 Construction Fund in addition to those under Ordinances 88051 and 89666; and abandoning balances in appropriations under Ordinances 87619 and 89000.
